description: To address the issues related to CVE-2023-36423, update the affected systems by deploying the appropriate KB Articles based on your operating system version. For Windows 10 x64 systems, apply KB5032199, along with KB5032196 and KB5032198, which are critical for mitigating the identified risks. For Windows 11 Version 23H2 users, ensure that KB5032190 is installed. It is essential to regularly check update packages that can be found through the provided links: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032197, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032199. After applying these updates, verify the implementation by checking the system build numbers to make sure they align with the updates applied.
